title: Reflections for the Week of Cinco De Mayo 2019 - Vervake vs Peterson Transformation and more.
description:
Peterson and Vervaeke both have theories and practices designed to increase Meaning in life, but their approaches are different. Both are totally valid and edifying, but which one to choose? It may depend on temperament. Practitioners​ in the world rely on great scholars such as these to inform our practice. Isn't this the way it should be?

I meant to say "weekly" energy versus "weak".
